solution_line_template: Camilla needs {total_pizzas_needed}/{pizzas_per_dough_batch} = <<{total_pizzas_needed}/{pizzas_per_dough_batch}={dough_batches_needed}>>{dough_batches_needed} batches of pizza dough.

{dough_batches_needed} batches of pizza would require {dough_making_time_per_batch} x {dough_batches_needed} = <<{dough_batches_needed}*{dough_making_time_per_batch}={total_dough_making_time}>>{total_dough_making_time} minutes
Camilla needs to bake the pizzas {total_pizzas_needed}/{oven_capacity} = <<{total_pizzas_needed}/{oven_capacity}={oven_baking_times}>>{oven_baking_times} times

{oven_baking_times} times in the oven would take {oven_cook_time_per_batch} x {oven_baking_times} =<<{oven_baking_times}*{oven_cook_time_per_batch}={total_oven_baking_time}>>{total_oven_baking_time} minutes

Altogether, it would take {total_dough_making_time} + {total_oven_baking_time} = <<{total_dough_making_time}+{total_oven_baking_time}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes to finish making {total_pizzas_needed} pizzas
